QAData.question: Who won between Southampton and Manchester United on Sat, 27 Aug 2022 11:30:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Manchester United won 1–0 over Southampton on Sat, 27 Aug 2022 11:30:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Raphaël Varane completed the most passes (49) in the match.
James Ward-Prowse created the most chances (4) in the match.
Marcus Rashford has the least touches (28) of any outfield player.
Kyle Walker-Peters is the most fouled player in the match (3 times).
Diogo Dalot was Player of the Match with a rating of 8.74.
Scott McTominay lost the most duels (11) in the match.
Armel Bella-Kotchap won the most duels (9) in the match.
Romeo Lavia is the most accurate passer (92%) in the match.
